entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 01:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
